identity.name: Context Intelligence Platform
principles: Fusion: Enterprise Data x Swiss Poster Design
Contrast: Stark Black/White with Electric Amber accents
Density: High information density, managed by strict grids

usage_rules: NEVER use gradients for the background. Keep it flat and stark.
Use the Primary Orange (#FF9F1C) sparingly: Buttons, Active States, Key Metrics.
Dark mode should be DEEP BLACK (#050505), not gray.
Borders should be subtle but sharp (1px).

headings.usage: Page titles, Section headers, KPI values

mono.usage: Code snippets, IDs, Logs, Data tables

rules: Uppercase labels must be WIDE (tracking-widest) and small (text-xs).
Line height for body text should be relaxed (leading-relaxed).

containers.card: bg-card border border-border shadow-none hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300

buttons.style: Sharp edges or rounded-sm (2px). No pill shapes.
buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 font-bold uppercase tracking-wide text-xs

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-b-2 border-border focus:border-primary focus:ring-0 rounded-none px-0 transition-colors

cards.style: Flat, bordered, no shadow. Header separated by line.

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.02) on backgrounds to prevent sterility.

features: Large central search bar (Command Palette style)
Results displayed as Cards with 'Context Tags'
Role Selector (Engineer, PM, EM) as Tabs or Dropdown

images.description: Professional team avatar for dashboard header
Subtle abstract network background for empty states or login

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL DEPENDENCIES: npm install recharts react-force-graph-2d react-markdown lucide-react sonner clsx tailwind-merge
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to use the specific colors defined in 'colors.palette'.
3. OVERRIDE SHADCN: Modify ui/button.jsx, ui/card.jsx etc. to match the 'Sharp/Swiss' aesthetic (remove rounded-md, use rounded-sm or none).
4. MOCK DATA: Since backend might not be fully populated, create robust mock data for the Graph and Incidents to showcase the UI.
6. DATA-TESTID: Ensure every interactive element has a data-testid attribute.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds.
Use the 'Yellowish-Orange' (#FF9F1C) for primary actions only.
Keep the UI dense but legible.
Animations should be fast and subtle.
